sentences.en: " I reckon I do, " he answered coldly and spat again.
sentences.cn: " 我看就是这样, " 他顶了一句,又吐了一口.

sentences.en: " You have said quite enough,'said Aleck, coldly ; " let the subject be dropped. "
sentences.cn: “ 你说得够多了, ” 艾莱柯冷冷地说, “ 咱们别再说这个啦. ”

sentences.en: "Are you implying that I have something to do with those attacks?" she asked coldly.
sentences.cn: “你在暗示我和那些袭击有关吗？”她冷冷地问。

sentences.en: "I'll see you in the morning," Hugh said coldly.
Affronted at his impertinence, she stared at him coldly and wordlessly.
sentences.cn: 被他的无礼而冒犯, 她冷冷地、无言地盯着他.

sentences.en: He was coldly indifferent to other people.
Husband and wife turned coldly accusing backs toward each other.
sentences.cn: 这两口子冷冷地背向而坐,互相埋怨.

sentences.en: I went to him for help, but he treated me coldly.
sentences.cn: 我去求他帮忙, 他却待理不理.

sentences.en: Ke - ming made no comment; he only smiled coldly and walked out.
sentences.cn: 克明 不说什么, 只是冷笑一声就走了.

sentences.en: She surveyed him coldly with eyes that spat venom.
sentences.cn: 她冷眼打量着他,眼睛冒出怨毒的凶光.

sentences.en: Such petty - bourgeois individualists always look coldly from the side - lines at the people's cause.
sentences.cn: 这种小资产阶级个人主义者对人民的事业总是抱着冷眼旁观的态度.

sentences.en: Teachers should not treat their pupils coldly.
sentences.cn: 教师对待学生不应该冷若冰霜.

sentences.en: The woman eyed him coldly. "Don't be facetious," she said.
sentences.cn: 妇人冷冷地看着他，说道：“别没正经了。”
他们冷冰冰地接待了我们.

words.tran_cn: 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的

trans.tran_cn: 冷地，冷淡地，不友好地，冷静地
trans.tran_en: if you do something coldly, you do it without any emotion or warm feeling, making you seem unfriendly
